name: Matilda - Warrior Of Iron
description:
Open source free as part of the Reactor: https://www.patreon.com/Clickteam

Help Matilda save the kingdom as you navigate her around the pseudo 3d world defeating the forces of evil. This 3d game is rendered completely using nothing but the standard objects provided with Fusion and is cross platform! 

Features

  • Works on any exporter
  • No 3d objects required works with stock objects
  • Completely open source
  • External level file loading
  • External animation file support
  • Main example and simplified MFA's provided
  • Editor included

Requires Clickteam Fusion 2.5 to use the open source
